full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,NAM MKHA'I RNAL 'BYOR PADMA SHVA RA YI, ,DAG SNANG ROL BAR SHAR BA'I ZAB CHOS LAS, ,RJE BTZUN SENG LDENG NAGS SGROL LA BRTEN PA'I, ,CHAR 'BEBS BYA TSUL BDUD RTZI'I BUM BZANG BZHUGS, ,DAM MED LOG LTA'I BANG MDZOD CAN DAG LA, ,STON PAR MI BYA DAM TSIG RDO RJE'I RGYA, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @016B CES PA 'DI YANG RJE BTZUN SGROL MAS DGYES BZHIN RJES SU BZUNG BA, ^SH'AKYA'I @017A *, ,DGE SLONG BLO BZANG CHOS KYI DBANG PHYUG GAM, MING GZHAN GAR GYI DBANG POS ZIL MNON ZHES PA ME RTA CHO 'PHRUL ZLA BA'I DMAR PHYOGS KYI DGA' BA DANG PO'I NYIN RANG GI BSAM GTAN GYI KHANG BU DGE 'PHEL BYANG CHUB GLING DU GRUB PAR BGYIS PA 'DIS KYANG 'GRO BA KUN LA PHAN PA RGYA CHEN PO 'BYUNG BAR GYUR CIG , ,SNOD MIN LOG LTA'I BANG MDZOD CAN GYI SPYOD YUL MIN PAS BAG YOD PAR MDZOD CIG , ,,
author_simple: BLO BZANG CHOS KYI DBANG PHYUG,
